markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Energized Font](/Feats.aspx?ID=4430) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gnome" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=80" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 52 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Prerequisites**
focus pool, at least one innate spell from a gnome heritage or ancestry feat that shares a tradition with at least one of your focus spells

</column>

---

You can focus your mind more quickly thanks to the magic that flows within you. You regain 1 Focus Point, up to your usual maximum.
name: Energized Font
prerequisite: focus pool, at least one innate spell from a gnome heritage or ancestry feat that shares a tradition with at least one of your focus spells
prerequisite_markdown: focus pool, at least one innate spell from a gnome heritage or ancestry feat that shares a tradition with at least one of your focus spells
